item.title: Raspberry Pi * View topic - Lightweight python motion detection
item.description:
Raspberry Pi * View topic - Lightweight python motion detection

I have released a new version called pi-timolo (pi, timelapse, motion, lowlight) on my github repo https://github.com/pageauc per forum post below. This is written using the picamera python library. I have also included a pi-motion-lite for those who want a minimal picamera library python motion detection script for projects.

item.title: Is inequality a moral challenge?
item.description:
Is inequality a moral challenge?

Inequality might just be the defining challenge of our time. However, is it a moral challenge? Veteran philosopher Harry Frankfurt says we're looking in the wrong place, as Joe Gelonesi writes. US President Barack Obama declared it the defining issue of our times.
